text: Oregon Concordia University was a private, non-profit Lutheran university in Portland, Oregon in the United States. It was established in 1905. The university closed after the 2020 spring semester. It was the third private college to close in the Portland-area since 2018. == References == Category:20th-century establishments in Oregon Category:1905 establishments in the United States Category:2020 disestablishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Oregon Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Portland, Oregon
title: Oregon Concordia University
